scenario_text.value: Huh? A text?

You know, I figured I’d never get any that
made sense, so I put my phone on silent...
Oh, hey! I got one too!
Really?! What’s it say?
You say that like I’ll be able to read it...
Oh, actually, I kind of can?
I knew it!
Wait, how is that not a surprise?

Because Kaito got a text just now, and it
made more sense than usual too.
Oh...huh. But I don’t get it, what changed?

This isn’t a sign something totally weird is
going to happen again, is it?

(Whoa...all the color just drained from
Minoru’s face.)

(That’s not good. I don’t want him freaked
out when we face Plutomon and the Master.)

(Then again, it’s not like I know why we’re
suddenly getting these texts...)

(All I can think to do is either level with
him, or try to downplay this.)
(How should I reassure Minoru?)
Say I don’t know.
Downplay the texts.
Be honest.

Hey, man, I don’t know what’s up with these
texts any more than you do.
Right... I mean, how could you?

But since we can read them better than
before, maybe that’s a good sign?

Like, it could mean things are starting to
get better, and this’ll all end well!

Yeah, that’s gotta be it! Good thinking,
Takuma!
Downplay the texts.

I don’t know. I feel like it could just be
coincidence. Maybe we shouldn’t dwell on it.
Oh, no. No, no, no, no, no!

There’s no way it’s just coincidence. The
timing is too perfect.

But wait, since the texts are starting to
make MORE sense...

Then it probably means things aren’t getting
worse.
Yeah, you’re right.

Anyway, we should have everyone set their
phones to silent.
What? Why?

Because what if we’re in the middle of an
important fight and someone’s phone goes off?
That’d totally freak—er, surprise me!

(So, basically, because someone’s phone going
off could be scary.)

Good thinking. Let’s do that. We wouldn’t
want anyone getting distracted.

Right, exactly. Just what I was trying to
say!

And you know what? I got this. I’ll go tell
Kaito and Miu that’s what we’re doing!

We can’t afford to get distracted by our
phones going off in the middle of a fight,

so I’ll go tell Kaito and Miu to put their
phones on silent!
